extension.name: Social Login
extension.description: Social login is a module that addes the ability to create an account in the webshop with a scoial network account and then login in by simply clicking a button. No need to remeber the password. It has Facebook, Paypal, Google+, Twitter, Linkeding, Vknontakte, Windows live, Tumblr and more
Adds social login buttons to opencart
